title: World Kidney Day hopes to raise awareness for those affected by kidney disease
text: Updated: 22 minutes ago| We're now learning new details about what caused thousands in the Upstate to lose power and led to a massive backup on 85. Updated: 24 minutes ago| A man accused of killing a young motorcyclist in a crash pleaded guilty in court this afternoon. Updated: 25 minutes ago| A Greenwood man will spend almost two decades in prison after pleading guilty to what officials call a vicious assault. Updated: 4 hours ago| Youth summer art camp & spring sessions at the Greenville Center for Creative Arts Updated: 5 hours ago| Ingredients: Irish soda bread or a Brioch bread-cit out to a circle or leave whole Beech mushrooms , cooked or roast the mushrooms 4 oz beans/ baked or White beans 1 garlic clove 4 slices cooked bacon 1 small onion, diced Qauil egg or Chicken egg Banger sausage Chop bacon and add to sauce pan on med. heat, cook for 4 mins then add onion, garlic and beans. Cooke down to a paste consistency. Set aside Cut sausage in half lenth wise and cook in the sauce pan till done. Cook egg to preferred doneness Toast the bread, when toasted , add cooked sausage on top, and then the bean mix and then the cooked egg and mushroom on top
